short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Twitch stream with the chat below the video in a vertical orientation with the ability to resize them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ’  You can now watch Twitch stream with the chat below the video in the same tab or window with the ability to resize them to fit your needs. Also, you can view your Twitch following list with the option to get notified when one of your streamers goes online.

ğŸ’  Checkout https://vtwitch.com
